articles.title: Buccaneers 7, Patriots 0 (1st): Another slow start on defense
articles.description:
The Patriots are set for one of their toughest tests of the season on Sunday.

The post Buccaneers 7, Patriots 0 (1st): Another slow start on defense appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots trail Buccaneers 7-0 in the first quarter of their game on November 9.
Defense struggles continue for the Patriots, raising concerns among local fans.
This game is critical for the Patriots' playoff hopes in the 2025 season.

articles.title: MBTA Transit Police officer facing drunk driving charge after allegedly crashing into pole
articles.description:
The officer has been placed on “modified duty” following his arrest Oct. 19 for allegedly driving while under the influence.

The post MBTA Transit Police officer facing drunk driving charge after allegedly crashing into pole appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MBTA Transit Police officer arrested for DUI after crashing into a pole on Oct. 19.
Officer placed on modified duty pending the outcome of the drunk driving charge.
Incident raises concerns about public safety and accountability among transit police.

articles.title: Allston Car Wash employees still in federal custody after ICE raid
articles.description:
The workers, all of whom have work permits, were detained Nov. 4 in a raid conducted by federal agents last week.

The post Allston Car Wash employees still in federal custody after ICE raid appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ICE agents raided Allston Car Wash on November 4, detaining several employees.
All detained workers possess valid work permits, raising concerns about their legal status.
Local residents worry about the impact on community jobs and services in Allston.

articles.title: Infant botulism in 10 US states linked to formula being recalled
articles.description:
The cases occurred in Arizona, California, Illinois, Minnesota, New Jersey, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Texas and Washington.

The post Infant botulism in 10 US states linked to formula being recalled appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ten US states, including Massachusetts, report infant botulism cases linked to recalled formula.
The recall affects multiple brands, raising concerns among Boston parents about infant safety.
Local health officials urge vigilance and prompt reporting of any botulism symptoms in infants.
